message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. Let's be more realistic. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?
Considering inflation, I'm willing to compromise. This is the best I can offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than I would get, even though inflation is hurting you more than me.  Take the deal.
